contentList.content: Bolster your allies against the dangers that lie ahead.

Hit point maximum increased by [1].

When you roll a 1 on an Attack Roll, Ability Check, or Saving Throw, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

You can see in the dark up to [2].
Try to stop a spell being cast.
Your carrying capacity is increased by [1]%.
A magical barrier protects you from harm, making you resistant to all forms of damage. Incoming damage is reduced by [1].
You only take half damage from falling.

You have honed your senses to the utmost degree. You gain a +[1] bonus to Initiative, can't be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SURPRISED">Surprised</LSTag>, and attackers can't land <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hits</LSTag> against you.

Your unarmed attacks deal an additional [1] and count as magical for the purpose of overcoming enemies' <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to non-magical damage.
You are immune to being <LSTag Tooltip="CharmedGroup">Charmed</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag>.
While in combat, you heal [1] every turn, and restore [2] <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="KiPoint">Ki Point(s)</LSTag>.
